SEARCH
Package com.app.repository.impl.generic

Interface CrudRepository<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the entity managed by the repository.
ID - The type of the entity's identifier.
All Known Subinterfaces:
AnswerRepository, PlayerRepository, QuestRepository, StatisticRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCrudRepository, AnswerRepositoryImpl, PlayerRepositoryImpl, QuestRepositoryImpl, StatisticRepositoryImpl
public interface CrudRepository<T,ID>
Generic interface for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    delete(ID id)
    Deletes an entity from the repository by its ID.
    List<T>
    findAll()
    Retrieves all entities from the repository.
    List<T>
    findAllById(List<ID> ids)
    Finds all entities with the specified IDs.
    Optional<T>
    findById(ID id)
    Finds an entity by its ID.
    List<T>
    findLast(int n)
    Retrieves the last N entities from the repository, ordered by their IDs in descending order.
    T
    save(T item)
    Saves a new entity to the repository.
    List<T>
    saveAll(List<T> items)
    Saves a list of entities to the repository.

  • Method Details

    • save

      T save(T item)
      Saves a new entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      item - The entity to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved entity with its generated ID.

    • delete

      T delete(ID id)
      Deletes an entity from the repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The deleted entity.

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all entities.

    • findLast

      List<T> findLast(int n)
      Retrieves the last N entities from the repository, ordered by their IDs in descending order.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of entities to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of the last N entities.

    • findById

      Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to be found.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found entity, or an empty Optional if no entity is found.

    • findAllById

      List<T> findAllById(List<ID> ids)
      Finds all entities with the specified IDs.
      Parameters:
      ids - A list of IDs of the entities to be found.
      Returns:
      A list of entities with the specified IDs.

    • saveAll

      List<T> saveAll(List<T> items)
      Saves a list of entities to the repository.
      Parameters:
      items - The list of entities to be saved.
      Returns:
      A list of saved entities with their generated IDs.
